open 1st Person: You press a small button on your gauntlet, and the whirr of tiny gears can be heard as a small panel on the gauntlet slides open. 3rd Person: Archsenex presses a small button on his gauntlet, and the whirr of tiny gears can be heard as a small panel on the gauntlet slides open. Hidden: A soft click is followed by the quiet whirr of gears from somewhere nearby.

close 1st Person: You press a small button on your gauntlet, and the whirr of tiny gears can be heard as a small panel on the gauntlet slides closed. 3rd Person: Archsenex presses a small button on his gauntlet, and the whirr of tiny gears can be heard as a small panel on the gauntlet slides closed. Hidden: A soft click is followed by the quiet whirr of gears from somewhere nearby.

push 1st Person: You press a stud on the wrist of your cast bronze gauntlet, and gears whirr as the digits of the gauntlet uncurl outward like a mechanical blossom. 3rd Person: Gears whirr as the digits of Archsenex's cast bronze gauntlet uncurl outward like a mechanical blossom. Hidden: The soft whirr of gears can be heard from somewhere nearby.

poke 1st Person: You press a stud on the wrist of your cast bronze gauntlet, and gears whirr as the digits of the gauntlet inexorably close into a rock-hard fist. 3rd Person: Gears whirr as the digits of the gauntlet inexorably close into a rock-hard fist. Hidden: The soft whirr of gears can be heard from somewhere nearby.

pull 1st Person: You press a stud on the wrist of your white iron gauntlet, and gears whirr as the digits of the gauntlet close into a fist. The sound persists while your index finger uncurls, until it is fully extended. 3rd Person: Gears whirr as the digits of Archsenex's cast bronze gauntlet close into a fist and his index finger uncurls until it is fully extended. Hidden: The soft whirr of gears can be heard from somewhere nearby.

flip 1st Person: You press a stud on the wrist of your cast bronze gauntlet, and gears whirr as the fingers of the gauntlet close into a locked fist. Then, as Archsenex rolls the gauntlet palm heavenward, the fist's center digit rises like a lone sentinel in a wordless act of defiance. Hidden: The soft whirr of gears can be heard from somewhere nearby.
